name: nytimes
text:
A Justice Department investigation found that top department officials were “a driving force” behind the Trump administration’s migrant family separation policy.
https://t.co/3A1liZe0TE

name: nytimes
text: The inspector general’s draft report, obtained by The New York Times, details discussions inside the Justice Department about a policy implemented with little concern for children — no matter how young. https://t.co/3A1liZe0TE

name: nytimes
text: RT @nytmike: NEW: “We need to take away children,” AG Sessions told prosecutors, according to a draft DOJ IG report. That statement contradicts Sessions’ previous claim that “we never really intended” to separate children. w/@shearm @ktbenner https://t.co/938OvsSuus
